pr_title: Change cluster info actions to be able to resolve data streams.

timeline.message:
Change cluster info actions to be able to resolve data streams.

With this change the following APIs will be able to resolve data streams:
get index, get mappings and ilm explain APIs.

Relates to #53100

timeline.bodyText: There is no need to overwrite this method, because the super class uses the same thread pool.
timeline.author: martijnvg

timeline.bodyText: All subclasses check for the same block level.
